issue.title: [C#] Support Float16
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9048](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9048). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With <https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/936>, .NET is getting a `System.Half` type, which is a 16-bit floating point number. Once that type lands in .NET we can implement support for the Float16 type in Arrow.
